title: test-resource-h2 does not work
body:
### Describe the bug

Upgrade to Quarkus 3.7.0.CR1, the test-resource-h2 does not work as expected.

The example project: https://github.com/hantsy/quarkus-sandbox/tree/master/resteasy-classic
The test used H2 test resource, https://github.com/hantsy/quarkus-sandbox/blob/master/resteasy-classic/src/test/java/com/example/PostRepositoryTest.java

### Expected behavior

The test should be got passed.

### Actual behavior

The original test failed with the following exception.

```bash 
Build step io.quarkus.agroal.deployment.AgroalProcessor#build threw an exception: 
io.quarkus.runtime.configuration.ConfigurationException: 
Unable to find a JDBC driver corresponding to the database kind 'h2' for the datasource 'jdbc' (available: 'postgresql'). 
Check if it's a typo, otherwise provide a suitable JDBC driver extension, 
define the driver manually, or disable the JDBC datasource by 
adding 'quarkus.datasource."jdbc".jdbc=false' to your configuration 
if you don't need it.
```


### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Windows

### Output of `java -version`

21

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.7.0.CR1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

mvn

### Additional information

_No response_
